item.description:
Explore the concept of strong women, Jewish Identity & the meaning of Purim in a whole new way. 7pm-Cocktail Reception * 8pm-Performance Cost: $18 Register by 2/20/12: bostonjcc.org/purimwithpizzazz or contact (617) 558-6478 or southareapurim@jccgb.org. Please bring a pair of XL pajamas or standard size slippers to donate to Rosie's Place.

To see original print ad go to: http://hebrewmamamita.com/shows/details/48-purim-with-pizazz-a-poeti-look-at-queen-esther

The performer is a very funny comedian!
item.name: Purim With Pizzazz; A Poetic Look at Queen Esther with Vanessa Hidary
